tool_description: Use the Donations API to easily make charitable contributions through your platform. The API manages the entire donation lifecycle from initial creation to final deposit. All funds are routed through Our Change Foundation to ensure expedient and secure payouts.
name: Donations and Carbon Offsets
title: Donations and Carbon Offsets

api_list.name: /api/v1/donations/show
api_list.description: Retrieves the details of a donation you've previously made.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The id of a donation. Ids are returned when a donation is created.

api_list.name: /api/v1/donations/index
api_list.description: Retrieves a list of donations you've previously made. The donations are returned in order of creation, with the most recent donations appearing first. This endpoint is paginated.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Which page to return. This endpoint is paginated, and returns maximum 30 donations per page.

api_list.name: /api/v1/nonprofits/show

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The id of a nonprofit from the CHANGE network.

api_list.name: /api/v1/donations/carbon_calculate
api_list.description: Calculates the donation amount (to CarbonFund 501(c)3) needed to offset a physical shipment. This calculation depends on the weight, primary transportation method, and distance of the shipment. Provide the distance of the shipment using the origin and destination address, or directly with the number of miles. For convenience, this endpoint also returns the id of the nonprofit CarbonFund, for making a subsequent donation to. See the [Carbon offsets guide](/recipes/carbon-offsets/) for more on using this endpoint.

required_parameters.name: weight_lb
required_parameters.description: The total weight (in pounds) of the shipment.

optional_parameters.name: transportation_method
optional_parameters.description: The primary transportation method of the shipment.

optional_parameters.name: distance_mi
optional_parameters.description: The total distance (in miles) of the shipment. You can use this parameter in place of `origin_address` and `destination_address`.

optional_parameters.name: destination_address
optional_parameters.description: The destination zip code (US only) of the shipment. If you send this parameter, also send `origin_address`.

optional_parameters.name: origin_address
optional_parameters.description: The origin zip code (US only) of the shipment. If you send this parameter, also send `destination_address`.

api_list.name: /api/v1/donations/carbon_stats
api_list.description: Measures your carbon offset impact in relatable terms. Provide the id of a donation to CarbonFund to see stats about that specific donation. If you omit the donation id, this endpoint returns aggregate stats for all of your CarbonFund donations.

optional_parameters.name: id
optional_parameters.description: The id of a donation to the CarbonFund nonprofit. Ids are returned when a donation is created. If an ID is not provided, the total stats for all donations to CarbonFund are returned.

api_list.name: /api/v1/donations/crypto_calculate
api_list.description: Calculates the donation amount (to CarbonFund 501(c)3) needed to offset a cryptocurrency transaction. For convenience, this endpoint also returns the id of the nonprofit CarbonFund, for making a subsequent donation to. See the [Carbon offsets guide](/recipes/carbon-offsets/) for more on using this endpoint.

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: The number of transactions to offset.

api_list.name: /api/v1/nonprofits/list
api_list.description: Retrieves a list of nonprofits whose names match the provided name. This endpoint is paginated.

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: The page to return. This endpoint is paginated, and returns up to 30 nonprofits at a time.
